title: Add assertions for java.util.regex.Matcher?
description:
Summary

Add custom assertions for java.util.regex.Matcher.

Example

java.util.Pattern pattern = ...;
String input = ...;
java.util.regex.Mather matcher = Pattern.matcher(input);
assertThat(matcher).matches()
    .hasGroupCount(1);
    (
        .extractingGroup()
        .extractingGroup(index)
        .extractingGroup(name)
    )
    .isEqualTo("some");
